articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Participants of KCU 7th Congress
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Participants of KCU 7th Congress
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un sent gifts to the participants of the 7th Congress of the Korean Children's Union.
					 A ceremony of awarding the gifts was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were officials of the youth league and the delegates.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, in his address said that the gifts are associated with deep loving care shown by Kim Jong Un as their real father would do and his ardent desire to see the KCU members to stoutly grow to be able revolutionary persons of talent, knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy, and pillars of prospering Korea.
					
					 The speaker called upon all the KCU members to prepare themselves as reliable successors to the Songun revolution intensely loyal to Marshal Kim Jong Un, true to the pledge they made before the KCU flags with the pride of being members of the glorious Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Children's Union.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Visits Masik Pass Skiing Ground under Construction
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Visits Masik Pass Skiing Ground under Construction
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Friday went round the construction site of the Masik Pass Skiing Ground.
					 He enjoyed a bird's-eye of skiing courses extending along mountain ranges from the top of the ground. He was deeply impressed to learn that the soldier-builders carried out the huge project in a matter of less one year in the revolutionary soldier spirit and a-match-for-a-hundred stamina of soldiers.
					
					 He said that it is the steadfast resolution and fixed will of the Workers' Party of Korea to build a world-class skiing ground in the Masik Pass area and provide the people and school youth and children with highly civilized and happy living conditions.
					
					 The skiing ground is a project to which the WPK attaches great importance, he said, calling upon the People's Army to always take the lead in ushering in a great heyday of construction in the new era of the Songun revolution, true to the grand plan of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un for building a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					  The project to be undertaken in the future is very vast and there are not a few difficulties and obstacles, he noted, expressing confidence that all soldier-builders would unconditionally wind up the construction of the skiing ground within this year by giving full play to Kim Jong Il's patriotism and waging an all-out charge and death-defying drive as intended by the WPK.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets PM of Pakistan
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets PM of Pakistan
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Friday sent a congratulatory message to Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif upon his assumption of office as prime minister of Pakistan. 
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished the prime minister of Pakistan great success in his responsible job.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Hamhung Area
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Hamhung Area
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of key factories and enterprises in Hamhung area alive with a drive for increased production true to the historic appeal made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 He toured several production processes of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Ryongsong Machine Complex that have been technologically updated. He learned in detail about the production of fertilizer and essential chemical goods there. 
					
					 Consultative meetings of officials concerned were held on the spots.
					
					 The premier underscored the need to glorify the proud tradition in which the workers there upheld the Workers' Party of Korea with successes in boosting production in each grim period of revolution. He called on the enterprises to bring about innovations as they play important roles in increasing production in agricultural and light industrial fields, the key fields in economic construction this year, and in improving people's living standard, in response to the call of the WPK. The consultative meetings also discussed issues of ensuring profitability in enterprise management and business activities as required by the new century.
					
					 The meetings called on the relevant units to take measures for satisfactorily supplying raw and other materials and electricity necessary for keeping the production going at a high rate at enterprises.
					
					 The premier also visited the Hamhung Woolen Mill, the Hamhung Knitwear Factory and the Hungnam Electrode Factory to discuss the issue of technological updating. 
					
					 The consultative meetings held at the relevant units took measures for solving issues arising in technological updating, including rationally distributing equipment, making up for the missing production processes and improving heat control.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses US and S. Korea of Anti-DPRK Offensive Drill
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses US and S. Korea of Anti-DPRK Offensive Drill
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces and the south Korean puppet army recently staged a joint military drill for crossinig the Rimjin River. This can never be overlooked as it is a dangerous attempt to ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. speaks volumes about "ensuring peace and security" on the Korean Peninsula. But this is nothing but rhetoric to cover up its true colors as a peace wrecker who escalates the tension and brings the dark clouds of a war to hang over the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal posing a military threat to the DPRK and systematically straining the situation on the peninsula through its ceaseless war drills.
					
					 The warmongers pretend to be interested in the detente on the peninsula, but they can never cover up their sinister intention.
					
					 If they are concerned for the peace on the peninsula, they should stop the dangerous military actions contrary to it, to begin with.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. is persisting in its dangerous saber-rattling together with the south Korean warmongers, asserting that it is the best way to go ahead with military pressure and economic sanctions simultaneously.
					
					  It is the sinister intention of the warmongers to push the situation on the peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension and ratchet up international pressure upon the DPRK under the pretext of its countermeasures to cope with the situation. 
					
					 The U.S. is talking about "dialogue" in public but more frantically intensifying its provocative anti-DPRK offensive drills behind the scene. This is the height of its double-dealing tactics. 
					
					  It is as clear as noonday that the U.S. is the arch criminal escalating the tension on the peninsula and disturbing the peace and stability in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lambastes Confrontation Maniac's Provocative Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lambastes Confrontation Maniac's Provocative Remarks
 Pyongyang, June (KCNA) -- Kim Kwan Jin, puppet minister of Defense of south Korea, in his recent talks with the U.S. Secretary of Defense in Singapore, blustered that " the north's provocation and threat can never be tolerated" and "it would get nothing through provocation and threat," a string of reckless remarks seriously rattling  the nerves of the north and insulting it. 
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes this in a bylined commentary.
					
					 It is a crafty artifice to label the DPRK "a provocateur" in a bid to evade the blame for straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula and escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 In a huddle with the U.S. secretary of Defense Kim Kwan Jin made an oft-repeated hue and cry over "the north's provocation" and "threat" in an effort to divert elsewhere the desire of the people for detente and improved relations. This is evidenced by the fact that he agreed with his master on establishing a "combined field command" to replace the U.S.-south Korea "Combined Forces Command" after the transfer of the right to command wartime operations in 2015. It is a scenario of the puppet group to keep south Korea as a colonial military base of the U.S. even after 2015 and continue pursuing confrontation with fellow countrymen, backed by the U.S. This found a vivid manifestation in the fact that Kim signed a joint statement on "cooperating with Japan in deterring the north's provocation" with the Japanese minister of Defense at a military confab targeted against the DPRK.
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff that it is hard to defuse the tension and improve the inter-Korean relations under the situation where warmongers are keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen, holding important government posts. That is why Koreans at home and abroad are increasingly concerned over the prospect of dialogue though the south Korean authorities accepted the DPRK's proposal for dialogue recently.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want detente and improved inter-Korean relations, they should prove their will by taking such practical steps as eliminating confrontation maniacs.

articles.title: Punishment of Fascist Dictator Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Fascist Dictator Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Voices calling for punishing traitor Chun Doo Hwan, a fascist dictator and murderer, are growing stronger in south Korea.
					 The Society for Commemorating the Movement for Democracy and the Solidarity Meeting of Organizations to Honor Memory of Martyrs for National Democracy held a press conference on June 5 at which they declared they would let all people know about the crimes of Chun and launch dynamic actions.
					
					 They insisted on revising the law so that the mandate of the prosecution to investigate the issue of additional imposition related to irregularities and corruption of the traitor may be discussed and the guard of him be stopped if the court rules he was guilty of involvement in a rebellion, etc.
					
					 The People's Solidarity for Inheriting the Spirit of the Movement for Democracy declared it would join civic organizations in an action for punishing the fascist murderer.
					
					 Organizations for the democratization movement held a press conference in Yonhui-dong, Seoul on May 16 calling for the payment of additional imposition related to irregularities and corruption. They demanded a stop to unreasonable guard of traitors Chun Doo Hwan and Roh Tae Woo, military dictators, who violated democracy and human rights. They also demanded the security authorities start investigation immediately.
					
					 The People's Action for Checking Distortion of May 18 History in an inaugural ceremony on May 30 said it would launch positive actions for punishing the fascist dictators in cooperation with all civic and public organizations of south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Myanmar Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Myanmar Paper
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Myanmar paper The New Age on June 1 specially edited an article titled "The Juche idea, Songun idea of DPRK" illustrated with a photo of the Tower of the Juche Idea on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The paper said:
					
					 When people say about the DPRK, we often heard the word "Juche". The Juche idea was founded by President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 The Juche idea is explained by independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					 Kim Jong Il successfully developed in depth the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 The Korean people are thoroughly embodying the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded and developed in depth by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in socialist construction, firmly guided by them.
					
					 Today the dear respected Kim Jong Un is carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche to accomplish it.
					
					 The West is working hard to tarnish the image of the DPRK. But as shown in the past Korean war, the Korean people are reliably defending the sovereignty and security of the country by giving full play to patriotism and heroism.
					
					 The DPRK is neither frightened nor deterred by the West's threat and mud-slinging.
					
					 Clear is the stand of the DPRK to reunify the country in a peaceful way. It had already access to nuclear weapons. Its nuclear technology is not imported from other country but entirely indigenous.
					
					 The DPRK's high level of science and technology is based on the Juche idea and the Songun idea.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Germany
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A German preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was formed on June 3.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, acting chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to send a delegate of the party to the celebrations for marking the anniversary and hold events for solidarity with the Korean people.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Benin
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Benin
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A Beninese national preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was inaugurated with due ceremony in Cotonou on June 5.
					 Hessou Kohovi was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events to introduce the undying exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu on the occasion of the anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Personages of Benin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Personages of Benin
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Personages of Benin praised President Kim Il Sung for performing immortal feats in winning the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War on June 5.
					 Kim Il Sung defeated the U.S. imperialists, the boss of imperialism, in the first half of the 1950s, firmly defending the dignity and sovereignty of the Korean nation. Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said this at the inaugural ceremony of the Beninese preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The Korean people's victory marked a historic event in which they proved in practice the truth that the peoples in colonies can surely save the destiny of the country and the nation and achieve the independence of the popular masses if  they fight, believing in their own efforts and relying on them, he stressed. 
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chairman of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and rector of Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin, noted: The young DPRK won the victory in the past Korean war, smashing the myth of the U.S. "mightiness" thanks to Kim Il Sung, the iron-willed brilliant commander and outstanding strategist.
					
					 The Korean people will win only victories in defending their sovereignty and building a thriving nation as they are holding in high esteem the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Bangladeshi Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Bangladeshi Organization
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee issued bulletin "For the people" on June 4 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 The history of Kim Jong Il's leadership over the WPK for half a century was characterized by the personality of a genuine statesman who served the people.
					
					 Wherever you go to the DPRK you can find worksites and families visited by him and hear anybody tell legend-like stories about his loving care for the people.
					
					 He found joy in the people's happiness and spared nothing for it. He made sure that helicopters flew for those mothers expected to give birth to triplets in a remote mountainous area far away from Pyongyang.
					
					 He regarded it as his lifelong mission, noble cause and greatest pleasure to dedicate himself to the people.
